item.title: In Praise of the Home Office
item.description: Mike Sager: Here in my home office, the line between pleasure and duty is blurred. Weekend or weekday, there is no difference to me. Nobody counts my hours. My work is also my hobby. It takes as long as it takes. A well written reflection on working from a home office.
